casebody.data:
Gamble LATROBE, Jr., James B. Knowles, and William S. Erichs, as Trustees in Bankruptcy of Thermiodyne Radio Corporation, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Isidore GAINSBURG, Defendant-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 3, 1929. No. 353. Ralph M. Arkush, of New York City, for appellants. Bernard Hershkopf, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
